column5: Is it just me, but I see on every thread, "Information Agent". Is this some kind of spammer.
You'll only see it when you're not logged in Dave.
if you log on you should only see it in the classified section
Thanks guys, I cleaned my cache and forgot to log on   . I'm having email problems, I can't seem to delete my emails. I've been trying everything. Darn PC's.

Get a MAC....I'm totally serious.  I went through 3 PC's always getting viruses and junk on them. Taking them to our IT guy at work at least once a year to clean up/fix. Bought a MAC 4 years ago...not ONE problem since.
PC's don't get viruses all by themselves    If you aren't very IT savy, then a Mac is a smart way to go.  But you are going to pay through the nose for it.

You are correct...computers DON'T get viruses by themselves. All I'm saying is without changing anyone's usage habits, be they good or bad..or without learning to be more computer savy..which I have absolutely no desire to do... then the MAC is the way to go for folks like me.  At the time it was about a $400 difference for me to upgrade to a MAC. Best $400 I have ever spent when I think of all the frustration I went through over the years with a PC.
